post.body: it was all of the above that slowed me down today and I'm sure this weekend.
gee thanks! Those people will make great targets for some snowballs.
Seems late to mail, is Santa gonna deliver them for you?
I'm going to be moving very slowly today.
Merry Christmas everyone
Time for some gift giving
Off to mass then picking up parents for dinner.
All this tech talk on software design review and the biggest concern is with text displayed to the screen. I should've majored in Legalese.
Made it home and I'm ready to crash.
Dunkin donuts stop
Hitting the road
Why am I getting attitude from people today? 6 more hours til I can get outta here.
Long day tomorrow - full day in office then drive home to Long Island. Gonna try to get some sleep now. Nite all.
Pushed a car stock at the drive-thru. Isn't that deserving of a free burger?
Wrapped and packed - time to find a late night snack...
Wrapping gifts - building code - packing - watching football - trying to stay warm.
Holy holiday traffic
Time for back to back meetings involving the same vendor that consumes my office life.
Morning meeting cancelled which means I might get some work done before lunch - if I can get this dsig to work.
Off to bed to rest up for this long holiday week.
